overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a strong presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky with a total of 3,580 followers and consistent engagement across platforms. The content primarily focuses on research developments, academic opportunities, and discussions related to disinformation and computational social science. Engagement is particularly high on LinkedIn, with notable interactions on Bluesky as well.

contentThemes.description: Posts about new research findings, papers, and projects.
Job postings and opportunities for researchers and students.
Discussions and insights into methodologies and findings related to disinformation.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts on all platforms to maintain engagement.
Leverage LinkedIn for more detailed posts and discussions, as it has the highest engagement.

platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon engagement is moderate; focus on increasing reposts by engaging more with followers.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn has the highest engagement, especially with posts about research grants and job opportunities.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
